movie_title: Important for world to coordinate efforts to tackle health crises: Vivian Balakrishnan
introduction: Foreign Affairs Minister Vivian Balakrishnan says that it is important to coordinate global efforts

vocabulary.definition: organized or carried out in harmony with others
vocabulary.example: It is important to coordinate global efforts to help in times of crisis.

vocabulary.definition: false or inaccurate information that is spread, especially through social media
vocabulary.example: Misinformation can lead to new challenges and confusion during a crisis.
The next healthcare crisis is inevitable, according to experts.

vocabulary.definition: existing or occurring within a country; not foreign or international
vocabulary.example: Dr. Balakrishnan emphasizes that strong domestic infrastructure is crucial.

vocabulary.definition: affecting or relating to a whole country or the world
vocabulary.example: There has been no progress on a pandemic treaty to address global health crises.

vocabulary.definition: unity or agreement of feeling or action, especially among individuals with a common interest; mutual support within a group
vocabulary.example: Global solidarity is essential for international cooperation in facing healthcare challenges.
